content: In order to fight him, you'll first need to complete his questline by defeating the Mother of Stones found in a large cave tunnel to the left, and return the Stone Essence to him. He'll then mock you for being gullible enough to give him the stone, and you'll then be able to fight him for the prize.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Man-in-Stone.md', within the main section titled 'Man-in-Stone', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Man-in-Stone'.
The content is as follows:
In order to fight him, you'll first need to complete his questline by defeating the Mother of Stones found in a large cave tunnel to the left, and return the Stone Essence to him. He'll then mock you for being gullible enough to give him the stone, and you'll then be able to fight him for the prize.
